New Records: Virat Kohli equaled Sachin Tendulkar's record for most ODI centuries (49)
Key Match Events: Ravindra Jadeja took 5-33 as SA subside to 83 all out in run-chase
Ravindra Jadeja has his five-wicket haul at a World Cup!
Pre-Game Insights: India captain Rohit Sharma: 'I think we are getting better. We look how we have played in the last three games.'
South Africa skipper Temba Bavuma: 'We know it's a challenge. We know there's a narrative about us chasing.'
Post-Match Reflections: Player of the match Virat Kohli: 'It was a big game and we were playing the toughest team in the tournament who have played well so far.'
India captain Rohit Sharma: 'We are not getting ahead of ourselves. There are couple of big games to come.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: India are the second team to bowl two opponents out for under 100 in a single men's World Cup (Sri Lanka 55, South Africa 83).
